Package jsocket.net

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    Base class of hierarchy This class represents either a UDP or TCP based connection
    ObjectConnection
    Wraps a Connection to provide SerDe operations to incoming/outgoing raw data
    StringConnection  
    TCPConnection
    Abstraction used for TCP based connections
    UDPConnection
    Abstraction used for UDP based connections
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConnectionException
    Used by TCPConnection and UDPConnection when transmission or reception fails
    InstantiationException
    Thrown if an exception occurs during constructor call
    SocketTimeoutException
    Exception is used by Connection
